Commentary.ab: Y9.18c bizaṇgranąm (x2)] Geldner, Kellens; Pirart bizəṇgranąm.
Y9.18c caϑβarə.zaṇgranąm] Geldner, Kellens; Pirart caϑβarə.zəṇgranąm.

Parallels.ab: yaϑa tauruuaiieni vīspanąm t̰bišuuatąm t̰baēšā̊ daēuuanąm maṣ̌iiānąmca yāϑβąm pairikanąmca sāϑrąm kaōiiąm karafnąmca = Yt14.4.
yaϑa tauruuaiieni vīspanąm t̰bišuuatąm t̰baēšā̊ daēuuanąm maṣ̌iiānąmca yāϑβąm pairikanąmca ~ Yt1.6 yaϑa azəm tauruuaiieni vīspe daēuua maṣ̌iiąsca yaϑa azəm tauruuaiieni vīspe yātauuō pairikā̊sca.

yaϑa tauruuaiieni vīspanąm t̰bišuuatąm t̰baēšā̊ daēuuanąm maṣ̌iiānąmca ~ Y52.3 tauruuaiieiṇtīm vīspā̊ t̰baēšā̊ daēuuanąm maṣ̌iiānąmca; ~ Yt13.142 yō vīspe tauruuaiiāt̰ daēuuāt̰ca t̰baēšā̊ maṣ̌iiāat̰ca.
